review: It's fine as far as it goes, but If Amazon instant video is important to you, then you'd better buy the Roku streaming stick instead.

review: Needs more applications and be able to mirror.  Also the device should be able to stream saved MP4 movies from a saved file.  It would also be nice if the device could run without adding a power connector.
